reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: Integrated Tuberculosis Care and Prevention, for Enhancing Case Findings, Health System Strengthening and Sustainability

description.narrative: Bangladesh - Tuberculosis - Economic Relations Division, Ministry of Finance of the People's Republic of Bangladesh - MOF Bangladesh. This program has the following goals: Reduce the incidence rate of TB (all forms) by 20% by 2020 and 90% by 2035 (from 2015 baseline figure 225/100,000). The objectives of this program are: Increase annual case detection of all forms of TB to 86% of all incident cases by 2020 from baseline of 61% in 2016.. Maintain a treatment success rate of over 90% in all forms of detected non-MDR TB cases.. Increase annual case detection of MDR- TB to 1,898 cases by 2020 from baseline of 969 in 2016.. Ensure that no TB-affected families facing catastrophic costs due to tuberculosis by 2020. Ensure that 80% of TB service facilities receive regular supervision and monitoring with appropriate feedback resulting in remedial actions by 2020.
